header.name: Flamebrand Longsword
header.subtitle: A blade forged in dragonfire, its edge forever burning

content.text: This elegant longsword has a blade of dark steel with veins of orange-red running through it like cooling magma. When drawn, the edge ignites with flickering flames that cast dancing shadows. The crossguard is shaped like two dragon wings, and the pommel bears a ruby that glows with inner fire. The leather-wrapped grip remains cool to the touch despite the blade's heat.

items.name: Flaming Blade
items.desc: Deals an additional 1d6 fire damage on hit

items.name: Flame Light
items.desc: Sheds bright light 20 ft, dim light 20 ft more (command word)

items.name: Never Cold
items.desc: You have resistance to cold damage while holding the sword

items.name: Magical Weapon
items.desc: Attacks count as magical for overcoming resistance

content.text: The blade remembers the dragon that forged it. In battle, I swear I can hear it roar.
content.attribution: ‚Äî Sir Kaelan Ashford, Knight of the Ember Order

items.name: Damage Calculation (One-Handed)
bullets: Average per hit: ~12 damage with +3 STR

items.name: Damage Calculation (Two-Handed)
bullets: Average per hit: ~14 damage with +3 STR

items.name: Flame Burst (1/day)
bullets: As a bonus action, wreath the blade in intense flame
Next attack deals an extra 2d6 fire damage
Target must make DC 15 DEX save or catch fire
Burning target takes 1d6 fire at start of each turn
Can use action to extinguish flames

items.name: Ignite (At will)
bullets: Touch the blade to a flammable object to ignite it
Can light torches, campfires, or oil without tinder

blocks.text: Flamebrand was forged by the red dragon Scoraxes as a gift for a human knight who saved his wyrmling from hunters. The dragon breathed fire upon the blade for seven days and nights, infusing it with elemental power.

items.title: The Frozen Keep
items.desc: Sir Kaelan used the blade's warmth to survive a month trapped in ice

items.title: Battle of Ashford
items.desc: The sword's flames ignited a troll's regenerating wounds

items.title: The Dragon's Return
items.desc: Scoraxes recognized the blade and spared the current wielder
